mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT b2.ptNum, COUNT(*), subject, rating, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, po.saveFilename postFilename, h.hallName, p.perfNum, rate FROM book2 b2, performanceTime pt, schedule s, performance p, poster po, hall h, rate r WHERE b2.ptNum=pt.ptNum AND pt.perf_date=s.perf_date AND s.perfNum2=p.perfNum AND po.perfNum=p.perfNum AND s.hNum=h.hNum AND r.rNum = p.rNum GROUP BY b2.ptNum, subject, rating, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), po.saveFilename, h.hallName, p.perfNum, rate ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ) WHERE rnum >= 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT rating, subject, p.perfNum, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, h.hallName, po.saveFilename postFilename FROM performance p, schedule s, hall h, poster po WHERE p.perfNum=s.perfNum2 AND h.hNum=s.hNum AND po.perfNum=p.perfNum GROUP BY p.perfNum,rating, subject, p.perfNum, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), h.hallName, po.saveFilename ORDER BY rating DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )WHERE rnum >= 1
